name: Contento
description:
How "Magic Fill" Works

https://youtu.be/3twZYizm9lk (🎥 3min)


For users in China:

https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1PP4y1b7X7 (🎥 3min)


Playground

https://www.figma.com/community/file/1022027088430321546


Features

1. Apply Content for Sublayers

Many times selecting multiple list items to apply data will become very cumbersome. In Contento, you need only select the parent layer, and apply different data to sublayers that have different names.


2. Unsplash Photos

You can choose photos from Unsplash to create image library. You can also provide any external image urls.


3. Content Types & Settings

Name provides settings:

  • Format - En: Full name / First & last / Abbr. Middle / Title & Last name & many more.
  • Format - Zh: 全名 / 仅名字 / 仅姓 / 尊称
  • Order: random / ascending

Phone provides settings:

  • Format - En: different US phone formats.
  • Format - Zh: 不同手机号格式，包括打码等。
  • Order: random / ascending

Any Image Library provides settings:

  • Pixel: default to auto, which automatically chooses pixels according to the width & height of each layer individually. Note: this feature is only for Unsplash image urls.
  • Order: random / ascending

Any Number Library provides settings:

  • Min value
  • Max value
  • Prefix
  • Suffix
  • Decimal number
  • Thousand separators

Any Date & time Library provides settings:

  • Date format
  • Time format
  • Time range
  • Order

Any Serial number Library provides settings:

  • Start value
  • Interval value
  • Places
  • Prefix
  • Suffix

公司 提供以下设置：

  • 格式：完整名称 / 精简名称

地址 提供以下设置：

  • 格式：完整 / 不带省份


4. Custom Libraries

You can create custom contents with types like text, images, numbers, date & time and serial number.
